item.title: Stocks to buy under  ₹200: Mehul Kothari of Anand Rathi recommends three shares to buy or sell

review.headline_rewrite: Stocks to buy under  ₹200: Mehul Kothari of Anand Rathi recommends three shares to buy or sell
bullets: Stocks to buy under ₹200: The Indian stock market ended flat on Friday, September 5, on profit booking as concerns over Trump tariffs and
The Sensex and the Nifty 50 market benchmarks opened higher but failed to hold gains despite positive global cues on expectations of a US
The Sensex slipped 7 points to end at 80,710.76, while the Nifty 50 ended at 24,741, up 7 points.
The BSE Midcap index fell 0.10 per cent, while the Smallcap index increased by 0.09 per cent.

item.title: GST 2.0: Renault to cut vehicle prices by up to ₹96,395 from Sep 22

review.headline_rewrite: GST 2.0: Renault to cut vehicle prices by up to ₹96,395 from Sep 22
bullets: Renault India on Saturday said it will reduce prices of its vehicles by up to ₹96,395 to pass on full benefit of the recent
The GST Council, earlier this week, approved limiting slabs to 5 per cent and 18 per cent, effective from September 22.
